titles.title: A bill to name the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center in Houston, Texas, as the "Michael E. DeBakey Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center".
A bill to name the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center in Houston, Texas, as the "Michael E. DeBakey Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Designates the Department of Veterans Affairs medical center in Houston, Texas, as the Michael E. DeBakey Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center.
